tosdr.case: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
quoteText: You may also provide information to Forbes in other contexts, including, for example, on your member profile page and public profile URL, to enter into a sweepstakes, contest, or promotion, or to apply for consideration in connection with a Forbes list or similar accolade (e.g., Under 30 list applications).
